mapper.update:
UPDATE pr_risk_catalog
risk_cata_id = #{risk_cata_id, jdbcType=INTEGER},
risk_cata_name = #{risk_cata_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
comment = #{comment, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_user_id = #{create_user_id, jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{create_time, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_user_id = #{update_user_id, jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_time = sysdate(),
state = #{state, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE risk_cata_id = #{risk_cata_id}
update pr_risk_catalog set state = -1 ,update_user_id = #{update_user_id} ,update_time= sysdate() WHERE risk_cata_id = #{risk_cata_id}
mapper.delete: update pr_risk_catalog set state = 1 WHERE risk_cata_id = #{risk_cata_id}
update pr_risk_catalog set state = 0 WHERE risk_cata_id = #{risk_cata_id}

mapper.sql: risk_cata_id, risk_cata_name, comment, create_user_id, (select name from aos_user where id =create_user_id) create_user_name, create_time, update_user_id, update_time, state

pr_risk_catalog.risk_cata_id, pr_risk_catalog.risk_cata_name, pr_risk_catalog.comment, pr_risk_catalog.create_user_id, pr_risk_catalog.create_time, pr_risk_catalog.update_user_id, pr_risk_catalog.update_time, pr_risk_catalog.state

AND risk_cata_name like '${risk_cata_name}%'
AND comment like '${comment}%'
AND create_time like '${create_time}%'
AND update_time like '${update_time}%'
AND state like '${state}%'
and state != -1
